description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 2/15/2007

Brooke is thrown when she finds out Nick and Taylor are celebrating Valentine’s Day together. Brooke is jealous as Nick tells her he will give her an answer about Jackie M later. Brooke admits to Rick that she still cares for Nick.  Rick doesn’t want Brooke to let Nick slip away. Rick leaves Nick a voicemail about Brooke. Rick assures Ridge he doesn’t have Valentine’s Day plans with Phoebe. Rick questions Ridge’s loyalty to Brooke. Ridge and Rick continue to argue about his relationship with Brooke. Later, Brooke understands why Ridge has to work on Valentine’s Day. She reflects on Nick and Taylor and how she is alone on Valentine’s Day. Meanwhile, Nick leads Taylor into a decked out dining room for a romantic Valentine’s Day. Nick fires Taylor as his psychiatrist and they kiss passionately.
